description:
The Ultimate Business Blueprint will teach you how to build your brand on Facebook.

This is so much MORE than just a course about Facebook.

It has been designed by businesses for businesses!

You will learn everything from branding your business professionally with logo design and slogan creation to how to engage fans and other businesses to boost your popularity and earnings.

Everything is covered with our 20 premium, easy to digest videos, that run to just over 2 hours of quality material, that will turn you into a Facebook master marketer.

The course covers the following -

Module 1

  • An introduction
  • Branding your business

Module 2

  • An introduction
  • Creating memorable slogans
  • The power of colours
  • Logo design
  • Premium graphics
  • Incorporating mascots

Module 3

  • Overview/introduction
  • Facebook Traffic
  • Demographics
  • Active groups
  • Recruit fans
  • Engagement content
  • How to outsource the hard work

Module 4

  • Overview
  • Creating simple video intros
  • Position your brand trust with educational videos
  • Boost your brand
  • Recap

So whatever your level of expertise or even if your are just starting a new business, there is something in this course that will benefit you and your ventures.
title: The Ultimate Facebook Marketing Blueprint
